function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Informal and formal interactions among occupants in health club facilities","Impact":"Increased potential for disease propagation","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, promoting use of face masks, and providing adequate ventilation","Technologies":"Air purification systems, contactless entry systems, and occupancy monitoring systems","People":"Occupants of the health club facilities","Owner":"Health club management"},{"Description":"Lack of staff training and supervision for precautionary measures","Impact":"Increased risk of disease propagation due to lack of adherence to safety protocols","Mitigation":"Regular training of staff, continuous monitoring of activities, and provision of protective equipment","Technologies":"Training modules, monitoring systems, and personal protective equipment (PPE)","People":"Health club staff","Owner":"Health club management"},{"Description":"Fear of shared spaces and lack of confidence among members","Impact":"Reduced participation and increased hesitancy to use the facilities","Mitigation":"Transparent guidelines, communication of safety measures, and regular feedback from members","Technologies":"Digital communication platforms, feedback systems, and occupancy tracking tools","People":"Health club members","Owner":"Health club management"}]}
